titlestmt.titleproper: E. R. Tinkham shell drawings undated
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Ernest R. Tinkham was born in 1904, in the city of Toronto, Ontario, Canada. In 1927 he received his B.S. from the University of Alberta, Canada, and in 1928 he received his M.S. in entomology from Montana State College. In 1939, he received his Ph.D. in entomology from the University of Minnesota. He died in 1987.

scopecontent.p: This is a sheet of 15 shell illustrations in pencil on cardstock, created by E.R. Tinkham. The shells are numbered, but are not labeled. The back of the sheet is marked "Plate 63" and stamped "T1617."

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
